item.title: Bookish Neon Signs to Brighten Your Reading Life
item.description: Light up your reading life (and reading space!) with these fun bookish neon signs, featuring dinosaurs, dragons, rainbows, and more.

item.title: Tiffany D. Jackson on Paving Her Way, 20 Years of TWILIGHT, and More YA Book News
item.description: Catch up with the latest in YA news, including a reflection on the cultural impact of TWILIGHT, new fall releases, and more.

item.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
item.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

item.title: Celebrate Sapphic September With These Books!
item.description: It's September, which means it's time for the Sapphic September readathon! Here are some recommendations for this year's prompts.

item.title: What Do I Do Now? The Best Baby and Parenting Books for First-Time Parents
item.description: From pregnancy guides to parenting through the climate crisis, here are some of the best baby and parenting books for first-time parents.
